biography.bio: Conan Lee was born in 1959 in Hong Kong as Lloyd Hutchinson. He is known for his work on Mulan (1998), Lethal Weapon 4 (1998) and Ninja in the Dragon's Den (1982).
biography.name: Conan Lee

biography.bio: Cecilia Yip was born on March 8, 1962 in Hong Kong as Si-Si Lee. She is an actress and producer, known for The Swordsman (1990), Hong Kong 1941 (1984) and Et là-bas, quelle heure est-il? (2001). She is married to Louis Tan.
biography.name: Cecilia Yip

biography.bio: Fang Bao was born on November 13, 1922 in Nanchang, Jianxi, China as Ji Huan Bao. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Cao mu jie bing (1960), Huahua Gongzi (1952) and Thunderstorm (1997). He died on September 22, 2006 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Fang Bao

biography.bio: Tin Shing Hoh is an assistant director and actor, known for Drunken Master (1978), Magnificent Butcher (1979) and Gui ma tian shi (1984).
biography.name: Tin Shing Hoh

biography.bio: Mark Houghton is known for his work on The Legend of Drunken Master (1994), Piège à Hong Kong (1998) and Kickboxer from Hell (1990).
biography.name: Mark Houghton

biography.bio: Based in Hong Kong since the mid 1980s, King made a name for himself in the world of Hong Kong action cinema, with supporting roles in innumerable Hong Kong movies including several of the biggest hits in Asian cinema history, such as Jackie Chan's "Armour of God 2: Operation Condor" and "Legend of Drunken Master", Jet Li's "Once Upon A Time In China", and Stephen Chow's "Fight Back To School". A non martial artist, King proved he was more than willing to take a hit and perform a stunt during his varied HK film career, eventually serving as stunt coordinator and performing stunts in both the Hong Kong lensed "Cracker", and "Night Watch" where he also doubled Pierce Brosnan.
biography.name: Mark King

biography.bio: Yin Lai is known for her work on Mou jing shi fen (1993), Zhang bao zi (1994) and Liu mang lu shi (1994).
biography.name: Yin Lai

biography.bio: Ken Lo was born on March 19, 1957 in Laos as Kenneth Lo Wai-Kwong. He is known for his work on The Legend of Drunken Master (1994), Rush Hour (1998) and New Police Story (2004). He was previously married to Suk Yin Lai.
biography.name: Ken Lo

biography.bio: Anthony Yiu-Ming Wong was born on June 16, 1962 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Anthony Yiu-Ming Wong
